# [Interview #979: Reddit AMA 2013, Entry #134](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=979#134)

#### [ethnicallyambiguous ()](http://www.reddit.com/r/Fantasy/comments/1ced7z/iamstilla_novelist_named_brandon_sanderson_ama/c9fpgmb)

What are your plans for the order of to-be-written books?

#### Brandon Sanderson

*Words of Radiance*
—Steelheart 2—
*Shadows of Self*
—Rithmatist 2
